CustomField.description: Internal field used for compensation purposes to sum amount difference between sold and actuals in this quarter on Compensation object. The value is calculated on Case - however obtained on Quote as the Quote is directly linked to an Activation Case
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sets the number for the quarter in which the Activation Case related to this Opportunity is closed - if Activation Case is closed in a quarter from a previous year the quarter will be 0
CustomField.label: Activation Case Closed in Quarter
